text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day after her half-hearted<n>scrimmage, Special Week
shows up to<n>training for a practice run.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... I'm not done yet!Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'm not going down without a fight!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As El Condor Pasa and Grass<n>Wonder begin to pick up their
pace,<n>Special Week concedes her space<n>and makes way
for the other two to<n>pass.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Wait, what?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Spe?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She is unmotivated, and it shows in<n>her running. During
partner running,<n>her friends also seem confused<n>seeing
such a downtrodden Special<n>Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: All right, enough of this! What's going<n>on, Spe?! Out with it!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Where's your usual motivation?!<n>Tenacity! Grit! What
happened to<n>you?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: El... Um, well... I'm s-sorry...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Sigh. You know what? Fine, haveit your way! We're done partnerrunning for today.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I can't run with you when you're like<n>this, Spe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: E-El...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Sorry, Spe... I think I'm going to call it<n>for today too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass... U-um... I'm sorry! I—

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Don't be sorry, Spe. Whatever it is,<n>we know it isn't your
fault, so don't<n>go blaming yourself.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
It's just... You seem lost, and running<n>without a sense of
direction is<n>dangerous. Peace of mind, peace in<n>running,
yes? You could hurt yourself.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
No need to rush, though. Okay, Spe?<n>Take your time calming
down. Facing<n>yourself comes after that.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
It just so happens that the person<n>who can best help you is
already here.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Um, I... I...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Heheh... Now then, I'll take my leave.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Okay... Thanks, Grass.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'm sorry. I just can't find<n>the motivation to run.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass is right... I think I'm lost.
choice_data_list:
What your friend said earlier... Is that what's
bothering you?

What your friend said earlier... Is that what's
bothering you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? How do you know that?
choice_data_list: Sorry, I kinda overheard your conversation.
Sorry, I kinda overheard your conversation.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, I see... That must have surprised<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I was... also a bit shocked.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I've never really been around other<n>Umamusume, and this
is my first time<n>making friends, so... it's also the first<n>time
a friend has yelled at me...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I was so surprised. It was like a<n>wave of chills swept over
my entire<n>body.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And ever since then, I've felt... off.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I try to run faster—try to<n>win—that wave of chills
comes back,<n>and my body refuses to listen.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer, what should I do? Will I ever<n>be able to run again?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Am I gonna be like this forever?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I just... I don't... What do I even do?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week crouches down and<n>tightly holds on to her
knees, tears<n>rolling down her face.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I decide to sit by her side to keep an<n>eye on her until she
finally calms<n>down.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hic... Phew... Sorry again, Trainer.I think I feel better now.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
The sun's already setting, huh?<n>Y'know... When I first
moved here, I<n>thought the days were super long,<n>but—

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Spe! I finally found you... Oh. Um, I'm<n>sorry! Am I interrupting
something?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're fine, Suzuka! Do you need<n>me for anything?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Well, a letter from your mom arrived<n>at the dorm, so I
thought I should bring<n>it to you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you always get so excited<n>whenever you receive a
letter from<n>your mom, so...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you, Suzuka! You really<n>shouldn't have!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka hands her the letter<n>and swiftly takes her
leave. In her<n>own way, she's also worried about<n>her
roommate.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the letter now in her hands,<n>Special Week slowly
opens the<n>envelope and reads the letter from<n>top to
bottom.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Same ol', same ol'.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, uh... right. my mom's closing line.<n>It's always the same.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
"Spe, my dear. I wish you a life of<n>happiness, forever and
always."<n>She's been telling me the same thing<n>for as long
as I can remember.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: My mom who raised me... and my<n>Mama gave birth to me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
My Mama actually passed away<n>before I could even open
my own<n>eyes. I've only ever seen pictures of<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But her best friend took me in and<n>raised me as her own.
She made me<n>the person I am today.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Mom told me that all Mama wished<n>was that I find peace
and<n>happiness—that the entirety of<n>Mama's hopes and
dreams lie within<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... Isn't it amazing? I get to have<n>two mothers! And
they both love me<n>more than anything!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: They really are... the best...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ...What I am doing?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, if you'll excuse me for a<n>moment... I'd like some time
alone to<n>run around this area.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without another word, Special Week<n>sprints off, and I watch
her back<n>disappear into the distance.
